creator.description:
Labeler for media with potentially seizure inducing (strobing) lights, harsh coloring, and harmfully loud volume. Run by @glitchypsi.xyz

Posts with a CW in text will be labeled with no content checking.

locales.description: This post contains media that has strobing, which may induce photosensitive seizures.
locales.name: Strobe/Quick flashing

locales.description: This post contains media that has audio levels that may cause hearing damage or a sudden volume jumpscare (clipped or not).
locales.name: Loud audio

locales.description: This post contains media that has unpleasant combinations of very harsh colors, which may be uncomfortable or disorienting to look at.
locales.name: Harsh colors/Eyestrain
